title: Info from dozens of companies, millions of Americans compromised by Russia-speaking cybergrime group
description: More victims have emerged of a Russian-speaking cybercrime group whose recent spree includes stealing information from several federal U.S. agencies.

title: Inside the $100 million door-knocking effort to boost Ron DeSantis
description: Allies of Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis see their large-scale door-knocking program as the centerpiece of an effort to overtake former President Donald Trump.

title: Jamal Khashoggi's widow speaks out
description: The widow of Khashoggi, the Washington Post journalist whose 2018 murder fueled international outrage and embroiled Saudi Arabia's crown prince in scandal, says her husband's killing should not prevent the country from cutting major deals in the U.S.

title: Some Reddit communities end blackout protest as tensions remain high
description: Many of Reddit’s communities have reopened after a protest shuttered vast swaths of the tech platform and led to outages.

title: Reddit CEO praises Elon Musk as protests rock the platform
description: Twitter owner Elon Musk may have had an influence on Reddit’s CEO ahead of changes to the website that have resulted in a user-led rebellion on the platform.

title: Meet the drag nuns caught up in the culture war over Pride events
description: The Sisters of Perpetual Indulgence Los Angeles chapter will receive an award at the Dodger's LGBTQ Pride Night Friday after weeks of controversy.

title: Expert report fuels election doubts as Georgia waits to update voting software
description: An unsealed expert report argues that Georgia’s Dominion Voting Systems machines are vulnerable to vote switching and hacking, even as the state downplays risks.

title: Daniel Ellsberg, Pentagon Papers whistleblower, dies at 92
description: Daniel Ellsberg, the whistleblower who exposed the U.S. government's lies about the Vietnam War by leaking the Pentagon Papers to some of the nation's top newspapers, has died, his family said in a statement on Friday.

title: Senators question Uber and Lyft on human trafficking risks
description: Ride-hailing apps Uber and Lyft are being scrutinized by senators over how both companies are fighting human trafficking.

title: Biden’s gamble: Delaying sanctions and playing down Chinese espionage will improve relations with Beijing
description: The Biden administration has delayed punitive economic measures against China and played down Beijing’s spying to protect efforts to revive a diplomatic dialogue.

title: How many people are watching Tucker Carlson’s new show on Twitter?
description: Tucker Carlson's new show on Twitter has drawn headlines. How many people are watching the ex-Fox News host's monologues?

title: An 11-year-old boy was among those killed by the tornado that flattened a Texas town
description: The youngest victim of a tornado that destroyed a small city in the Texas Panhandle and killed three people was an 11-year-old boy, authorities said Friday.

title: Pittsburgh synagogue gunman found guilty on all federal charges, jury rules
description: The jury has reached a verdict for Pittsburgh synagogue shooter Robert Bowers, who is accused of carrying out the deadliest anti-semitic attack in U.S. history.

title: UPS workers vote to authorize strike while cheering unexpected progress on heat safety
description: Unionized UPS employees voted overwhelmingly to authorize a strike as contract negotiations continue, clearing the way for a potential work stoppage as soon as Aug. 1.

title: Michael Jordan selling his majority  ownership of the Charlotte Hornets
description: Retired basketball superstar Michael Jordan is selling his majority ownership of the Charlotte Hornets to investors Gabe Plotkin and Rick Schnall, CNBC confirmed.

title: DOJ probe into Minneapolis police finds racial discrimination and excessive force
description: A federal investigation into the Minneapolis Police Department, launched after George Floyd's death, found a pattern of excessive force and discrimination.

title: Doctors' group raises new alarm about 'unsafe' weighted sleep sacks for infants
description: The American Academy of Pediatrics warns that weighted sleep sacks and swaddles could be deadly. Nested Bean and Dreamland Baby say their products are safe.

title: Meta rolls back measures to tackle Covid misinformation
description: Meta Platforms said on Friday that a policy put in place to curb the spread of misinformation related to Covid-19 on Facebook and Instagram would no longer be in effect globally.

title: Biden wanted to speak with China's Xi after U.S. shot down surveillance balloon
description: President Biden wanted to speak with China's President Xi after the U.S. shot down a Chinese surveillance balloon but his top advisers talked him out of it.

title: Space Command's leader is building out his Colorado HQ even as Congress tries to force the HQ to move to Alabama
description: The head of U.S. Space Command is building out his Colorado headquarters even as Congress members try to force the Pentagon to move the headquarters to Alabama.

title: Biden allies start to chafe at Democrats’ silent treatment of Trump indictment
description: President Joe Biden’s decision to stay silent about his opponent’s legal troubles is promptings warnings that Trump can’t be allowed to shape voters’ views.

title: Reddit CEO seeks to end site protest by allowing users to vote out moderators
description: Reddit CEO Steve Huffman said he wants to end user-led protest by instituting a rule that would allow users to vote out moderators who have overseen the protest. NBC News' David Ingram shares the latest.

title: 3 dead and dozens injured after tornado hits Texas city
description: At least three people are dead and more than 75 people were injured Thursday after a tornado struck the Texas Panhandle city of Perryton, officials said.

title: Biden announces pledge by ticket sales giants to eliminate hidden fees and show full costs upfront
description: Biden announced that Ticketmaster and Live Nation have pledged to provide consumers with full pricing upfront, ending surprise fees at checkout during online purchases.
